amendment.description: To allow the ethanol mandate in the renewable fuel program to be suspended temporarily if the mandate would harm the economy or environment.

vote.text: Amendment SA 843 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 60. Record Vote Number: 203.

action.text: Amendment SA 843 proposed by Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 539. (consideration: CR S7200-7204, S7217-7219; text: CR S7200) To allow the ethanol mandate in the renewable fuel program to be suspended temporarily if the mandate would harm the economy or environment.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 843 proposed by Senator Feinstein to Amendment SA 539.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 843 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 60. Record Vote Number: 203.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 843 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 35 - 60. Record Vote Number: 203.
